mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IDMS_LOGINOUT ( USERNAME, USER_IP, LOGIN_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{userIp}, #{loginDttm} )
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, USER_IP, LOGIN_DTTM, LOGOUT_DTTM FROM IDMS_LOGINOUT WHERE LOGIN_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CAST(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS DATE), '%Y%m%d'), '000000') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CAST(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS DATE), '%Y%m%d'), '235959') ORDER BY LOGIN_DTTM
